name: Wildlife Park 2 - Dino World
description:
Dino World offers:

• 11 different dinosaurs like t-rex, triceratops, ankylosaurus, archelon, pachycelphalosaurus, parasaurolophus, proceratops, stegosaurus, utah- and velociraptors
• 9 new and exciting missions
• learn a lot about dinosaurs and fossils
• new knowledge of dinosaur-research were taken into account

• Including Wildlife Park 2`s comprehensive sandboxmode with a bunch of decorations, plants, service-items, pen-items, terraforming, ways, grounds, fences, etc.
